metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1625 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information leak was discovered in OpenStack heat. This issue could allow a remote, authenticated attacker to use the 'stack show' command to reveal parameters which are supposed to remain hidden. This has a low impact to the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the system.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fixed in jammy-updates and kinetic-updates as a SRU, but not yet in the -security pocket.

criterions.comment: heat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
